about_the_game:
Open a second-hand shop in Detroit, take your first steps, and explore the experience of running a real second-hand store. Find amazing items, restore, sell, and establish your own shop kingdom!





Pawn Simulator, Prove your trading prowess. Find the most profitable products by bargaining and show off your trading skills. Develop your trading strategies and master your tactics to stay ahead of your competitors. You're no longer just a vendor, you're on your way to becoming the ruler of Detroit's trading world! Make a name for yourself with your achievements in every trade and prove that you are the most successful merchant running a pawn shop.





Open unique warehouses by participating in warehouse wars. But be careful, we don't know what will come out of the warehouse.





Pawn Simulator gives you the freedom to design your shop exactly as you imagine it. Arrange shelves, decorate shop windows and customize the atmosphere of your shop to impress your customers. Become a leader in the pawn trade by mastering your tactics to outsmart your competitors. Make a name for yourself with each successful transaction and prove that you are Detroit's most successful merchant running a pawn shop.





Are you ready to prove yourself on the streets of Detroit? Pawn Simulator gives you new abilities with each level up, giving you the opportunity to become the most successful pawn shop merchant in Detroit. Each new skill gives you advantages such as buying at better prices or selling with higher profit margins. Develop your trading strategies and skillfully use your tactics to stay ahead of your competitors. You're no longer just a vendor, you're on your way to becoming the ruler of Detroit's trading world! Make a name for yourself with your achievements in every trade and prove that you are the most successful trader running a pawn shop. Pawn Simulator invites you on a journey that will make you the best player in the trade. Are you ready?





Pawn Simulator gives you the opportunity to manage your shop as well as try your luck in the city's casinos. Get caught up in the excitement of adrenaline-filled games and try your luck to multiply your bankroll. You can try your luck at the roulette tables, show off your skills at the blackjack tables or try your luck at the slot machines in the hope of hitting the jackpot. Whichever game you prefer, you will have an unforgettable experience at the casino and multiply your fortune. But be careful, because luck may not always be on your side in the casino.



---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • DirectX: Version 11
